"Xiandy": "Thank you so much for coming to see me. Allow me to reintroduce myself."
"I am Xiandy. I am a researcher of various strange phenomena that occur all over Halpha."
"The reason I called you today was to ask for your help investigating one such phenomenon currently taking place."
"Thank you so much for coming to see me."
"I called you in hopes that you'd help with another one of my investigations, you see..."
"As it turns out, Kvaris has been seeing unusual weather phenomenon in recent days."
"My investigation is to determine its influence; whether or not it has an impact on the trees and local shrubbery."
"I've picked out a few spots in which I believe it'd be easy to observe any changes, but..."
"Would you be able to travel to some of those places and collect some data for me?"
"You can do it whenever you have some free time. I'd really appreciate it. Thanks in advance."
"<%me>, thank you very much!"
"This recent weather phenomenon, as I expected, appears to be quite abnormal for Kvaris."
"However, I'll need to conduct more research in order to find out what exactly is causing it to happen..."
"If it's alright with you, would I be able to continue to impose on your gracious assistance in this matter?"
"I'd also like to see if this weather phenomenon imparts any influence to enemies, you see."
"I look forward to your return!"
"The trees of Kvaris are looking quite lovely, aren't they?"
"Alas, the researcher in me won't let me just enjoy the scenery."
